explain.cv2_flag: 位置: demo_yolo3_deepsort.py ,作用: 控制opencv窗口的打开
explain.use_cuda: 位置: YOLO3/detector.py ,作用: 判断是否使用cuda
explain.map_location_flag: 位置: deep/feature_extractor.py ,作用: 控制map_location_flag_explain 在windows下，其值为true

explain_e.cv2_flag: adress: demo_yolo3_deepsort.py ,function: control the opening of the opencv window
explain_e.use_cuda: adress: YOLO3/detector.py ,function: cetermine whether to use cuda
explain_e.map_location_flag: adress: deep/feature_extractor.py ,function: control map_location_flag_explain ,under windows, the value is true
explain_e.bad_time: bad time,the unit is in seconds
explain_e.left_time: left time,the unit is in seconds
explain_e.need: objects to detect，the Numbers are in YOLO3/cfg/coco.names
